General.Name: Zhejiang Golden Eagle Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Golden Eagle Co., Ltd manufactures and sells textile products in China. The company offers knitting, woven clothing, and home textiles; woven knitted apparel; and silk, cashmere, linen, hemp and yarn, and hemp products, as well as other fabrics. It also provides plastic machinery products; die-casting machinery; and food machinery. Further, it develops real estate properties. Zhejiang Golden Eagle Co., Ltd was founded in 1966 and is based in Zhoushan, China.
